name: DashStack
tag_list: basecamp, dashboard, widget, status, project-management, metrics, team, workflow
overview:
DashStack is the interactive Basecamp and Basecamp Classic dashboard that works for you. We took the best parts of Basecamp and made them better.

All your Basecamp information, regardless of your verision, in one easy to use interface so that you can stay constantly in the loop and ultimately, more productive.

You no longer need 5 monitors to see all your projects at once. The most simple dashboard for basecamp has arrived.

Customize your page with your colors and logo. Lay out the page how you like it with only the widgets you need. We even have multi Basecamp account support.

Clients can access a custom dashboard as well. With DashStack you can set clients up with a dashboard with only the information they need and organized in a manner any novice could understand.

milestones.description: Changed branding to comply with 37signals policy
